The cycle of memory, intelligence and the end

Three types of civilized buildings can be built in the "City Square". +12% of all outputs respectively when owning civilized buildings and in the Golden Age of [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] or [ICON_GLORY_SUPER_GOLDEN_AGE].
Stealing the Torture of "Gateway"

Each [ICON_Citizen] population that believes in your mainstream religion releases loyalty pressure +1 and provides 1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value. [NEWLINE]After building "Kefale Square", a one-time regional project was obtained: "Fire Chase".
Hunting the tinder of "disputes"

When the technology to unlock the land military unit is completed, the capital will get one of the units for free. [NEWLINE] A city with garrison is permanently loyal, a city with loyalty [ICON_Amenities] livability +2, [ICON_Production] productivity +30%. [NEWLINE] At the beginning of the round, the combat power of all current land units is improved, and the increase value is the highest livability of the current city [ICON_Amenities]. If it is used up to the neutral cell, reset its [ICON_Movement] movement force once. [NEWLINE] Golden and all land units that have gained an increase from the General have an additional +2 movement power. You can restore full health for one round and can output full damage to the city.
Carrying the turbulence of "romantic"

The [ICON_Culture] cultural value +2, [ICON_Housing] housing +2 and [ICON_Amenities] livability +1 provided by the plantation. [NEWLINE]One existing cells do not reduce the charm of adjacent cells, and all specialized areas receive adjacent bonuses equal to the charm value of the cell.

Builder +1 usage times. [NEWLINE] The time for construction area [ICON_Production] is greatly shortened in cities with less than three specialized areas. [NEWLINE] Unlock the builder's ability to plant natural forests, but before municipal "civil engineering", the benefits of removing the landform are -35%.
Kefale Square

Tirisipios characteristic area, alternative holy land. [NEWLINE] Release cultural bombs after completion. This city allows the purchase of buildings using the [ICON_Faith] faith value, and enjoy a 30% discount when purchasing buildings. [NEWLINE] Get +1 [ICON_Faith] belief value from adjacent flat topographic cells and -1 [ICON_Faith] belief value from adjacent mine improvement facilities.
Suspension Arena

A characteristic area of ​​Wanjie, which replaces the military camp and can be built next to the city center. When completed, a cultural bomb was released to adjacent cells and a Golden Genesis was obtained. [NEWLINE] Each building in this area provides 2 points of [ICON_Housing] housing for the city.
Yunshi Tiangong

Agraya's characteristic area, which replaces the canal, provides a large bonus for adjacent areas. [NEWLINE] is given a golden man when it is completed, and the city's [ICON_Citizen] population is immediately filled with [ICON_Housing] housing cap, and the city's plantation improvement facilities +1 [ICON_Food] food, +2 [ICON_Production] productivity. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] For each marble heavenly palace on the field, all marble heavenly palaces can produce an additional 1 [ICON_Amenities] livability and 2 points [ICON_Production] productivity.
Tree Garden

The characteristic area of ​​Nakshi Xia, which replaces the academy, provides [ICON_Culture] cultural values ​​instead of [ICON_Science] technological values. When it was completed, a Golden Man was obtained, a cultural bomb was released, a city wall was built and a forest was generated in its own cells within the second ring road of the city center. The buildings +2 housing in the area, the foundation and buildings in the area are the woods +1 technology value +1 productivity, rainforest +1 cultural value +2 gold coins, and a random [ICON_Science] technology is given.
The remains of the fire
Tirisipios gave away when he created the city, and could perform the project "Fire Trip" in cities with debris of fire.
memory

One characteristic building in Onpharos can only be built, not at the same time as intelligence and the end. After completion, the adjacent bonus of the holy land also provides the [ICON_Culture] cultural value. After unlocking the flight, provide an equal amount of [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance.
Intelligence

One characteristic building in Onffalos can only be built, not at the same time as memory and the end. After completion, the college's adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Production] productivity, and the [ICON_Science] technology value of the fixed output of the college's buildings also provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins.
End

One characteristic building in Onfaros can only be built, not at the same time as memory and intelligence. Once completed, the adjacent bonus of the commercial center and port also provides [ICON_Food] productivity, with each commercial center and port +1 [ICON_Gold] gold for all trade routes.
The journey to the fire

The special project of Tirisipius can only be carried out once per city, and requires the area "Cefal Square". During the [NEWLINE] implementation of the project, the city's [ICON_Religion] religion will spread rapidly to surrounding cities and provide 4 times the [ICON_Faith] faith value and the Great Prophet's points for the "Holy Land Prayer". After completing the project, the city's external output pressure will increase by 100%, and all "Kefale Square" +1 [ICON_Faith] belief values ​​and +1 [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance will be obtained, and 1 Golden Gen (if you can obtain it).
Golden Abdomen

Onfaros' special melee unit, which cannot be trained or purchased, and does not require maintenance fees, can only be obtained by triggering the leader's ability. [NEWLINE]This unit always has the same [ICON_Strength] attack power as the melee unit you already have. A single player has up to 12 Golden Genres.
Planting natural forests
Unlock the builder's ability to plant natural forests.
